content: I hate this trend. All those “bullshit jobs” do not make our salaries bigger. All those phrases kinda like “best specialists still will have enough money” are real bullshit. No, they don’t. And those people who tell the opposite simply have interests in the “education business”. The main responsibility is on those idiots, who have started creating the online\offline courses. How did those courses amount grow for the last decade? Over 10000000% ???
